sqlMap.select: SELECT A.MB_NO, A.MB_TITLE, A.MB_CONTENT, A.MB_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.MB_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_SDATE, TO_CHAR(A.MB_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_EDATE, A.MB_PIC, CASE WHEN A.MB_STATUS=0 THEN '모집중' WHEN A.MB_STATUS=1 THEN '모집완료' END AS MB_STATUS, A.MB_HIT, A.P_NAME, B.P_PIC, C.REG_NAME, A.REG_NO FROM MAIN_BOARD A, PROFILE B, REGION C WHERE A.P_NAME = B.P_NAME AND A.REG_NO = C.REG_NO ORDER BY MB_NO DESC

SELECT A.MB_NO, A.MB_TITLE, A.MB_CONTENT, A.MB_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.MB_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_SDATE, TO_CHAR(A.MB_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_EDATE, A.MB_PIC, CASE WHEN A.MB_STATUS=0 THEN '모집중' WHEN A.MB_STATUS=1 THEN '모집완료' END AS MB_STATUS, A.MB_HIT, A.P_NAME, B.P_PIC, C.REG_NAME, A.REG_NO FROM MAIN_BOARD A, PROFILE B, REGION C WHERE A.P_NAME = B.P_NAME AND A.REG_NO = C.REG_NO AND MB_NO = #mb_no#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MAIN_BOARD SET MB_HIT = MB_HIT+1 WHERE MB_NO = #mb_no#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT into MAIN_COMMENT (MCOM_NO, MCOM_CONTENT, MCOM_DATE, MB_NO, P_NAME) VALUES (MAIN_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#content#, SYSDATE, $mb_no$, #p_name#)
sqlMap.select: select A.MCOM_NO, B.P_PIC, A.P_NAME, A.MCOM_DATE, A.MCOM_CONTENT FROM MAIN_COMMENT A, PROFILE B WHERE A.P_NAME = B.P_NAME AND MB_NO = #mb_no# ORDER BY 1 DESC
select B.COUN_NO, B.COUN_NAME from CONTINENT A, COUNTRY B where A.CONTI_NO = B.CONTI_NO AND A.CONTI_NO = #conti_no#
select REG_NO, REG_NAME from COUNTRY A, REGION B where A.COUN_NO = B.COUN_NO AND A.COUN_NO = #coun_no#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MAIN_BOARD(MB_NO, MB_TITLE, MB_CONTENT, MB_DATE, MB_SDATE, MB_EDATE, MB_PIC, MB_STATUS, MB_HIT, P_NAME, REG_NO) VALUES(main_board_seq.nextval, #mb_title#, #mb_content#,SYSDATE,#mb_sdate#,#mb_edate#,#mb_pic#,0,0,#p_name#,#reg_no#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.MB_NO, A.MB_TITLE, A.MB_CONTENT, A.MB_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.MB_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_SDATE, TO_CHAR(A.MB_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_EDATE, A.MB_PIC, CASE WHEN A.MB_STATUS=0 THEN '모집중' WHEN A.MB_STATUS=1 THEN '모집완료' END AS MB_STATUS, A.MB_HIT, A.P_NAME, B.P_PIC, C.REG_NAME FROM MAIN_BOARD A, PROFILE B, REGION C WHERE A.REG_NO like #reg_no# AND A.MB_SDATE IN (SELECT MB_SDATE MB_EDATE FROM MAIN_BOARD WHERE MB_EDATE >= #sdate# AND MB_SDATE <= #edate#) AND A.P_NAME = B.P_NAME AND A.REG_NO = C.REG_NO ORDER BY MB_HIT DESC

SELECT A.MB_NO, A.MB_TITLE, A.MB_CONTENT, A.MB_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.MB_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_SDATE, TO_CHAR(A.MB_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_EDATE, A.MB_PIC, CASE WHEN A.MB_STATUS=0 THEN '모집중' WHEN A.MB_STATUS=1 THEN '모집완료' END AS MB_STATUS, A.MB_HIT, A.P_NAME, B.P_PIC, C.REG_NAME FROM MAIN_BOARD A, PROFILE B, REGION C WHERE A.P_NAME = B.P_NAME AND A.REG_NO = C.REG_NO ORDER BY MB_HIT DESC
SELECT CONTI_NAME, COUN_NAME FROM REGION A, CONTINENT B, COUNTRY C WHERE A.COUN_NO = C.COUN_NO AND C.CONTI_NO = B.CONTI_NO AND A.REG_NO = #reg_no#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MAIN_BOARD SET MB_TITLE = #mb_title#, MB_CONTENT = #mb_content#, MB_SDATE = #mb_sdate#, MB_EDATE = #mb_edate#, MB_PIC = #mb_pic#, REG_NO = #reg_no# WHERE MB_NO = #mb_no#
UPDATE MAIN_COMMENT SET MCOM_CONTENT = #mcom_content#,MCOM_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE MCOM_NO = #mcom_no#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO NOTE (NOTE_NO, NOTE_SEND, NOTE_CONTENT, NOTE_SDATE, NOTE_STATUS, MEM_ID, NOTE_TITLE) VALUES (NOTE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'SYSTEM',#PNAME#, SYSDATE, 0, (SELECT A.MEM_ID FROM MEMBER A, PROFILE B WHERE A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND B.P_NAME = #p_name#) ,#mb_no#)
INSERT INTO PICK (PICK_NO, P_NAME, MB_NO) VALUES(PICK_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#PNAME#,#mb_no#)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PICK WHERE P_NAME = #PNAME# AND MB_NO = #mb_no#

update main_board set MB_STATUS = 0 where MB_NO = #mb_no#

SELECT DISTINCT A.MB_NO, A.MB_TITLE, A.MB_CONTENT, A.MB_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.MB_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_SDATE, TO_CHAR(A.MB_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_EDATE, A.MB_PIC, CASE WHEN A.MB_STATUS=0 THEN '모집중' WHEN A.MB_STATUS=1 THEN '모집완료' END AS MB_STATUS, A.MB_HIT, A.P_NAME, B.P_PIC, C.REG_NAME, A.REG_NO FROM MAIN_BOARD A, PROFILE B, REGION C, PICK D WHERE A.REG_NO = C.REG_NO AND A.P_NAME = B.P_NAME AND A.MB_NO IN (SELECT MB_NO FROM PICK WHERE P_NAME= #p_name#) ORDER BY MB_NO DESC
